title: get orders by stage
description: Verify that the GET /api/orders endpoint correctly returns a list of orders filtered by the specified stage parameter, including stages orders, main, call, booking, and archive.

title: trigger backup workflow
description: Verify that the POST /api/trigger-backup endpoint successfully triggers the GitHub Actions backup workflow and returns a 200 status code on success and a 500 status code on server error.

title: get report settings
description: Verify that the GET /api/report-settings endpoint returns the current report settings including email recipients and backup scheduling information.

title: update report settings
description: Verify that the POST /api/report-settings endpoint updates the report settings correctly with valid input and returns a 200 status code confirming the update.
